description: In a recent update to its privacy policy, Elon Musk’s social media platform, previously known as Twitter, has revealed its intention to leverage public data to train artificial intelligence (AI) models. This development comes in the wake of concerns from Bloomberg about the platform’s collection of biometric information, job details, and user education data. The ... Read more

title: Ripple Price Prediction: XRP at Risk of 20% Price Drop; Borroe Presale Experiences Rising Momentum
description: In the dynamic world of cryptocurrencies, where fortunes can change in the blink of an eye, investors remain vigilant as Ripple’s XRP faces a potential 20% price drop.
